name: p1--Andromeda UGC Studio-Latam
description:
IMPORTANT RULES (MUST BE RESPECTED):
DO NOT change, refactor, or redesign ANY existing UI elements.
DO NOT modify any existing logic that is already working.
DO NOT remove or overwrite any current data or behaviors.
ONLY add the new logic described below.logique dyal Double Reference khdama b had l-marahil f l-khalfya bach t-dman belli l-visuals jayin m7to7in f blasthom:
1. L-Marhala dyal l-Planning (Gemini Flash)
Ghir kat-generer l-script, l-app kat-sifto l-Gemini Flash m3a wahd l-instruction kat-golléh:
"Had l-script fih 6 dyal l-machahid (scenes). Goli kulla scene ina View kat-nasébhā: Wach l-berra (Outside) dyal l-produit, awla l-dakhel/tafasil (Inside)."
L-AI kay-rajje3 wahed l-plan fih masalan: Scene 1: Outside (Hook), Scene 4: Inside (Detail dyal l-jiyoub/texture).
2. L-Mapping dyal l-Reference
F l-marhala dyal generation dyal l-tsawer (Gemini Image 2.5), l-app kat-chouf hadak l-plan:
Ila kanet l-scene "Outside": Kat-khoud l-Base64 dyal l-Main Photo w kat-siftha hiya l-Image Model k-marji3 (Reference).
Ila kanet l-scene "Inside": Kat-khoud l-Base64 dyal l-Detail Photo.
Logique dyal l-Fallback: Ila l-user ma-uploada-ch l-Inside Photo, l-app automatic kat-reje3 l-Main Photo bach ma-y-tqte3-ch l-flow.
3. Prompt Engineering (Visual Consistency)
L-app melli kat-sift l-tswira l-marji3ya, kat-zid wahed l-instruction f l-prompt:
"Match this reference exactly. This is the [Inside/Outside] view. Keep the same colors, materials, and lighting."
Had l-kalimat l-mifta7ya kat-khalli l-AI y-fhem belli rahoum ghir ajza2 men nafss l-produit w machi produit akhor.
4. Regeneration Precise
Ila derti "Regenerate" l-wahed l-scene bo7d-ha, l-app 3aqla f l-database (BulkResults) ina view khtat dik l-scene f l-awwel, bach dima t-khdem b l-reference s7i7a (Outside m3a Outside, w Inside m3a Inside).
